ygData.subject: Re: Spells in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: I specifically look for ROOT and GATE spell.  Somehow they don t carry them. ... From: Shane Bennett  To:  Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
I specifically look for ROOT and GATE spell. Somehow they don't carry them.
